turns.text: uh-huh Uh the only prob- the only problem I see with term limitations uh is that I think that the bureaucracy in our government as is in with most governments is just so complex that theres very lar- you know there there is learning curve and that you know you - cant just send someone off to Washington and expect you know his first day to be an effective uh Congress person Uh I think I think there really is theres lot they need to learn you know when you get there
